segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to falling, but he’s determined to get that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s done this before or if this is his first attempt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to make it, but the risk is too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he hurries up before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a reckless thing to do, especially with the floor all wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm he looks while standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to be okay, but I’m still worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is both exciting and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
